alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 1:04PM MST until November 29 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches with up to 6 inches on benches. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Northern Wasatch Front and Utah Valley. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A band of moderate to heavy snow may accompany a cold front this afternoon into this evening, with snow rates approaching 1 to 2 inches an hour at times in some locations. Snow will decrease in intensity behind the frontal band and may even stop for a time before redeveloping Monday night into Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley
